text.text: Lee:May I have a look at the menu?
女招待:当然可以， 给你。
Wang:Thank you　Well，I'd like to start withthe snake soup
王:谢谢，咽，我先来份蛇羹。
Lee:I'd like to have a glass of beer
Waitress: A snake soup and a glassof beer
女招待:一份蛇羹和一杯啤酒。
女士先请　 Lee:May I have a look at the menu?　 李:我能看一下菜单吗?　 Waitress:Sure　Here you are　　女招待:当然可以，给你。　 Lee: Thank you　Ladies first　 李:谢谢，女士先请。
Wang:Thank you　Well，I’d like to start withthe snake soup　 王:谢谢，嗯，我先来份蛇羹。　Lee:I’d like to have a glass of beer
Waitress:A snake soup and a glassof beer　 女招待:一份蛇羹和一杯啤酒。
